from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
x = iris.iloc[:, 1:-1]
y = iris.iloc[:, 5]
x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(x, y, test_size=0.3)
print(x_train.shape, y_train.shape)
